elitefour.Title: No Pokemon Available
elitefour.Body: Your current team is wiped out! Visit the **/pokecenter** to revive your team, or swap them out with **/modifyteam**.

elitefour.Title: Not Enough Badges
elitefour.Body: You have not completed the Gym Challenge for this region yet. Please defeat all Gym Leaders through **/gymbattle** then try again.

elitefour.Title: Incorrect Region
elitefour.Body: The Gym Leader you specified is in the **{0}** region! Swap to that region using **/changeregion** in order to battle them.

elitefour.Title: Too High Level

gymbattle.Title: No Pokemon Available
gymbattle.Body: Your current team is wiped out! Visit the **/pokecenter** to revive your team, or swap them out with **/modifyteam**.

gymbattle.Title: Gym Leader Does Not Exist
gymbattle.Body: The Gym Leader you specified does not exist. Please select from the list of Gym Leaders provided.

gymbattle.Title: Incorrect Region
gymbattle.Body: The Gym Leader you specified is in the **{0}** region! Swap to that region using **/changeregion** in order to battle them.

gymbattle.Title: Too High Level

gyminfo.Title: Gym Leader Does Not Exist
gyminfo.Body: The Gym Leader you specified does not exist. Please select from the list of Gym Leaders provided.
